::Kup/Lord Elder/Jhiaxus-Hevn::
   
  Elder smirks as he has a thought protraing Windlord as 'Captain Obvious.'
   
  Kup: That it is, lad. I do have an idea though. The Minions took the reformatted Maximal version of the Matrix from Rodimus. A version of the Matrix from our contemporary time. That's more then four million years in the future. The Autobot version of the Matrix from this time period is on the planet. If we find the Ark I'm sure we could jump start Rodimus', or would that be Hot Rod's, Matrix with Optimus Prime's.
   
  Elder: Would that drain the Autobot matrix and change history?
   
  Kup: I'm hopeing that the mystical properties of the Matrix arn't so linear.
   
  Meanwhile Hevn had sat with Nightlight.
   
  Hevn: In time Rodimus is going to be alright. You arn't helping yourself sitting here worrying. How about we go get a drink and calm down a bit? Besides I havn't seen the little one in a very long time.
   
  ::Hot Rod::
   
  While in the CR chamber Hot Rod starts to dream. Images of the past swirl around him. Finally one scene overtakes the others.
   
  Where am I? Wait I remember this place.
   
  It was a chamber inside the chaos bringer himself. Inside Unicron. This was Earth year 2005 AD. It was dark. Finally a voice calls out from a familiar Transformer in the darkness.
   
  Bot: Come out, Autobot! We all must die someday...
   
  Galvatron!
   
  Hot Rod now sees himself sneeking around in the shadows, coming closer to the Decepticon Commander.
   
  Hot Rod: Not today, Galvatron!
   
  Hot Rod lays Galvatron out with a right hand before transforming to car mode and driving off. Galvatron gets up a fires a few shots from his fusion cannon before transforming to cannon turret mode and shooting off a few more.
   
  The blasts all strike near Hot Rod but do not hit him. He transforms to robot and fires a few shots from his arm mounted blasters. Hot Rod then changes abck to car mode and hits his headlights to blind Galvatron.
   
  Hot Rod's shots force Galvatron to transform back to robot mode but he cannot see with Hot Rod's headlights in his optics. Suddenly he is rammed back as Hot Rod hits him while in car mode.They wrestle as Hot Rod changes to robot mode while held by Galvatron. It ends with Galvatron over Hot Rod choking him with both hands, beginning to crush his vocal processor and coolent pipes.
   
  Not this. Not again.
   
  Galvatron: First Prime, then Ultra Magnus. Now you. It's a pitty you Autobots die so easily or I might have a sense of satisfaction...
   
  Galvatron is cut off as Hot Rod grabs the Matrix of Leadership that galvatron was wearing around his neck. Hot Rod pulls untill the chain breaks and he rolls away from Galvatron. Hot Rod gets back to his feet.
   
  Yes!
   
  Optimus Prime's voice booms from the Matrix itself.
   
  Optimus Prime: Arise Rodimus Prime.
   
  Rodimus: Optimus...
   
  Galvatron: No... No...!
   
  Galvatron fires from his fusion cannon twice. The first shots seems to have no effect on Rodimus. the second knocks the Matrix from his hands. Rodimus points to Galvatron.
   
  Rodimus: This is te end of the road, Galvatron!
   
  Rodimus rushes in and picks up Galvatron, pressing him. He tosses Galvatron through the hull of Unicron's body out into deep space where Galvatron will eventually crash into the dead lava world of Charr.
   
  Rodimus picks up the Matrix and prepares to open it.
   
  Rodimus: Now... Light our darkest hour!
   
  Rodimus cannot open it.
   
  What?! It didn't happen like this?
   
  Rodimus looks down at the Matrix and sees that it is dead. No energy. No wisdom of the ages.
   
  An evil laughter booms through Hot Rod's mind. The laugh materializes into one form: Cyclonus!
   
  Cyclonus: It's not yours to use anymore Prime. The Matrix does not belong to you and you do not belong to it. There is no power. No hope. Your world, your life, useless. It all ends soon.
   
  The laughter continues as Hot Rod completely blacks out again.
  

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Nightlight/Windlord:

Nightlight sat apart when she heards, that she was depressed and she 
felt defendless

Windlord went close to Kup and said looking to Hevn, Lord Perseus and 
Kup said "This is no good"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Kup::
> 
> Kup: Hard to say. Who knows how being stripped of the matrix like 
that has effected him.



                         

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
--0-327987848-1199589216=:53411
